name: Merlin Project File
summary: Learn about .MERLIN2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A MERLIN2 file is a project plan created in ProjectWizards Merlin, a project management application for macOS. It contains project resource, task, and timeline data used to show a project plan in Merlin. .MPROJECT files replaced MERLIN2 files when Merlin Project and Merlin Project Express replaced Merlin.

instructions: If you still have access to ProjectWizards Merlin (Mac), you can open a MERLIN2 file in Merlin. Otherwise, you can open a MERLIN2 file in Merlin Project (Mac, iOS) or Merlin Project Express (Mac).
